mapper.select:
SELECT max(a.id) as id, d.id as opId, b.id as opdId, b.group_no as groupNo, b.group_seq_no as groupSeqNo, b.visit_id as visitId, max(a.crte_time) as registerTime, c.name, c.age, c.gender_code as genderCode, d.doctor_name as doctorName, c.age_unit_code as ageUnitCode, d.dept_name as deptName, d.crte_time as crteTime, b.content, b.item_name as itemName, b.speed_code as speeCdode, b.exec_name as execName, b.dosage, b.dosage_unit_code as dosageUnitCode, b.usage_code as usageCode, f.name as rateName, c.visit_no as visitNo, b.num, b.num_unit_code as numUnitCode, b.spec, b.is_skin as isSkin, e.is_positive, e.skin_result_code, f.daily_times, MAX(ope.is_print) as is_print FROM outpt_infusion_register a inner JOIN outpt_prescribe_detail b on a.opd_id = b.id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code inner JOIN outpt_visit c on a.visit_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code inner JOIN outpt_prescribe d on b.op_id = d.id and a.hosp_code = d.hosp_code left JOIN base_rate f on b.rate_id = f.id and a.hosp_code = f.hosp_code left JOIN outpt_skin_result e on b.visit_id = e.visit_id and a.hosp_code = e.hosp_code and b.id = e.opd_id LEFT JOIN outpt_prescribe_exec ope on b.hosp_code = ope.hosp_code and b.visit_id = ope.visit_id and b.id = ope.opd_id where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and d.is_settle = '1' and d.is_cancel = '0'
and ( c.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or c.visit_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or c.cert_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
and b.usage_code in
#{item}
and b.is_skin = #{skinPrintFlag}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.crte_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and (!JSON_CONTAINS(ope.is_print, JSON_OBJECT(#{typeCode}, '1')) or ope.is_print = #{printSign})
and (JSON_CONTAINS(ope.is_print, JSON_OBJECT(#{typeCode}, #{printSign})))
and ope.is_print = #{printSign}
group by b.id
order by a.id asc, d.id asc, b.id asc, d.crte_time DESC, a.crte_time DESC, b.group_no asc , b.group_seq_no asc

update.foreach: update outpt_prescribe_exec set is_print = #{dto.isPrint} where hosp_code = #{dto.hospCode} and opd_id = #{dto.opdId}
